feed.title: Gull Island Rapids (Trans-Labrador Hwy) - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Gull Island Rapids (Trans-Labrador Hwy)
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Monday night: Snow mixed with ice pellets. Temperature rising to minus 12 by morning.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Snow at times mixed with ice pellets beginning before morning. Snowfall amount 2 cm over eastern sections. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 12 by morning. Wind chill minus 27 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow mixed with ice pellets. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Snow at times mixed with ice pellets. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of ice pellets or snow. Temperature steady near minus 6.
entry.summary: Light snow at times mixed with ice pellets changing to ice pellets in the evening then to snow before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Freezing rain or snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Freezing rain or snow. High plus 1. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Flurries. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Flurries. Low minus 3. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Flurries. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Flurries. High minus 1. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 12. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 9.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 9. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Monday 16 January 2023
